name: PACTUM + EPISODE 1
description:
WELCOME BACK.

ARE YOU BORED ?
ENTER THIS GAME TO FOLLOW THREE FRIENDS EXPLORING AN ABANDONED HOUSE.
YOU WILL HAVE TO CHANCE TO MEET ALL THREE OF THEM.

ZOE, THE GIRL OF THE GROUP, SHE IS A FOLLOWER AND YEARNS FOR ROMANCE.
LUKE, THE LEADER, HE IS ZOE’S BEST FRIEND AND NEVER STOPS TAKING HER ON FUN ADVENTURES.
AND ALEX, THEIR TAG-ALONG MEMBER WHO FOUND HIMSELF DRAGGED IN…

COMPLETING ALL ROUTES STRONGLY ENCOURAGED.
SERIOUSLY, IF YOU DON’T DO IT… YOU MIGHT JUST HAVE ONE BAD EXPERIENCE.
YOU WOULDN'T WANT THAT TO HAPPEN, WOULD YOU ?
GOOD LUCK.


Features and Content:
⦁ In this visual novel, you get meet and play three different characters.
⦁ Learn more about their relationships and the story by playing different routes !
⦁ Discover the hidden thoughts of each character by playing through first-person.
⦁ Make different choices to alter dialogues, and the story !
⦁ Find all the hidden footage in PACTUM, to try and retrace... Complementary content !
⦁ You might meet an additional character...
⦁ Make the choices the game would want you to pick !
